post:
Hi,

I'm not sure if this Post is allowed to go over here or not. I repeatedly gone through the rules post but there is no indication about Domain offer. Any Admin/Mod can let me know if this violates any rule, I'll remove the post :)

SYNC SERVE is basically running for a long time since 2013. It's based in Bangladesh & located in Dhaka City.

We're running a promotion on .com & .net Extension basically. There is no other specified hidden charges. You can just add your domain to cart & checkout. Payment Method only PayPal available for now. Also no issues afterwards.

> Domains at $6.49 for .com & .net - [https://domain.syncserve.net/](https://domain.syncserve.net/)

If anyone wants to join as reseller, there is furthermore discount. You can check it out [here](https://dpartner.syncserve.net/).


Regards,
Nagib Mahfuz
